column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This place was amazing!! It was our first time trying a local coffee shop in Houston as we are from out of state and this place is the real deal! The manager
column3: was on the floor and helping out which is always good to see. It also felt like the three areas (drinks
column5: and the kitchen) worked together really well to provide a great experience. The food and drinks were great
column6: too. The sausage and egg sandwiches were a sizable portion and my friend's soft scramble was delicious. As for the drink
column7: it was one of the best iced lattes I've ever had! I wish I had a location in my hometown!
